PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-02612020-04-20,  ,  ,  ,  IRCC,  ESDC,  PS,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Emergencies Act and Quarantine Act)
PrecisRegulations amending the REGULATIONS AMENDING THE IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (EMERGENCIES ACT AND QUARANTINE ACT) in order to control and prevent the spread of COVID-19 within Canada by ensuring that foreign nationals and employers of temporary foreign workers comply with measures that protect public health.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0091
AttachmentsAttachment
